subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Sasha Pavlovic scored 12 of his season-high 16 points in the fourth quarter, leading a group of Boston Celtics reserves in a 78-66 win over the visiting Miami Heat as both teams rested their top players.
snippet: Sasha Pavlovic scored 12 of his season-high 16 points in the fourth quarter, leading a group of Boston Celtics reserves in a 78-66 win over the visiting Miami Heat as both teams rested their top players.
